results.title: Atenolol Ameliorates Skeletal Muscle Atrophy and Oxidative Stress Induced by Cast Immobilization in Rats
results.text_hl: After the last dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, forced swimming test, rotarod test, and footprint analysis were performed, and skeletal @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle loss@@@ was determined.

citations.NLM: Kumar A, Raorane CJ, Rawat D, Prajapati P, Raj R, Kumar D, Kim SC, Raj V, Kushwaha S. Atenolol Ameliorates Skeletal Muscle Atrophy and Oxidative Stress Induced by Cast Immobilization in Rats Biomedicines. 2023 Apr 25;11(5):. PMID: 37238940
